tags.name: Malik's Bar
tags.description: Malik's bar usually opens after 18:00, but it varies. Malik is the owner and the bartender. There are various affordable homebrewn drinks. It's easy to create an event for yourself like a birthday. Downstairs there are changing art exhibitions.
